abstract: Flights to Europe for a little less, determining a home's value, the benefits of "barefoot" running shoes and other consumer focused news from The New York Times.
snippet: Flights to Europe for a little less, determining a home's value, the benefits of "barefoot" running shoes and other consumer focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Monday Reading: Flights to Europe, for a Little Less
